text:
DoSomething.org | New York City | Full Time

DoSomething.org is one of the world’s largest organizations for young people and social change. We have the stability of a 22-year-old institution, but we look, feel, and operate like a tech-forward startup. We are way more fun than wherever you’re working at right now.

We're looking for a seasoned engineer and architect who loves high-impact software development and application architecture.

We are hiring for - Senior Software Engineer - Technical Messaging Lead

Deatails & apply https://www.dosomething.org/us/about/were-hiring
